long_description: The SRAM X5 9-Speed rear derailleur delivers precision and dependability on a budget, ensuring your shifts are quick and clean whether you're riding on the trail or around town. 1:1 actuation ratio means that when the cable moves, the derailleur moves the same amount for simple setup and dependable performance. Constructed out of tough, lighweight aluminum to withstand rigorous trail use. Direct cable routing reduces the amount of friction involved, which enhances shifting performance. Compatible with SRAM 1:1 7-, 8- and 9-speed shifters; long cage accommodates up to a 36T rear cassette.
short_description: The SRAM X5 9-Speed rear derailleur delivers precision and dependability on a budget, ensuring your shifts are quick and clean whether you're riding on the trail or around town.
